turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Good afternoon, thanks for calling Reliable Home Services. How can I help you today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Hi, I need an electrician to look at some flickering lights in my office.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Sure, let me transfer you to our booking team to get that scheduled.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Hello! I'll get your electrical appointment booked. Can I get your full name?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Thanks Maria. And your phone number?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Got it. I've noted electrical service. When were you hoping to have the appointment?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Let me check Saturday for you. Unfortunately we don't have availability this Saturday. I can offer Thursday the twentieth at 9 AM, 10 AM, or 2 PM. Would any of those work?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Thursday at 2 PM it is. What's the address for the service?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Here's what I have: name: Maria Garcia, phone number: 0498123456, type of service: electrical, preferred date: 2025-03-20, preferred time: 14:00, service address: 88 Lonsdale Street, Melbourne VIC 3000. Does everything sound correct?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Booking confirmed. Reference number: BK-D4E5F6. Electrical service on Thursday the twentieth at 2 PM. Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Thanks Maria, we'll see you Thursday. Have a great day!
